name: Earth-808
description:
Avoid meteorites and return to the Earth!

Create your own spaceship by combining and upgrading the satellites
Simple and addictive strategy flight game! "Earth-808"

Destroy the space meteorites and avoid them.
Earn better satellites and cores.

Cool things
◆ Earn awesome spaceship called "Universe".
◆ Get variety satellites.
◆ Collect the better cores.
◆ Experience various patterns of meteorites.
◆ Destroy all planets that block your way!
